definition: to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert disaster
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
variant of 花[hua1]
danger/dangerous/rugged
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
non-Han people, esp. to the East of China/barbarians/to wipe out/to exterminate/to tear down/to raze

sentences.english: Rebirth cooldown has been reduced from 20 minutes to 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 化险为夷冷却时间从20分钟收缩到10分钟。

sentences.english: Your intellectual wit will bring greater popularity with your peers.
sentences.chinese: 但你的聪明智慧将能化险为夷并给你带来超强人气。

definition: misfortune turns to blessing (idiom); to turn an inauspicious start to good account
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
to be more scared than hurt (idiom)/to get through a daunting experience without mishap
to escape (danger)/to rescue/to come out alive
to come back from death's door (idiom); unexpected rescue from danger/fig. to recover from a seemingly impossible situation/to find a way out of a predicament
to just escape from calamity
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); snatching victory from the jaws of defeat
mortal danger, escape alive (idiom); a narrow escape/to survive by the skin of one's teeth
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
critical circumstances/risky conditions/danger zone
lit. to make one's way through a dangerous pass as if walking on level ground (idiom)/fig. to handle a crisis effortlessly
lit. to upend heaven and earth (idiom)/fig. to change the course of events/to turn things around
one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)
pinyin: da4 nan4 bu4 si3 , bi4 you3 hou4 fu2

definition: dangers spring up all around (idiom); surrounded by perils
see 吉人自有天相[ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4]
great catastrophe
